LanguageData.ARA_GestaltBandwidthTip: The Hive Network is a system for Arachne insects to construct Gestalt thought clusters. Through this, the entire tribe gains a strong unity under the unified command of the Empress species.
LanguageData.ARA_GestaltBandwidthExceeded: Warning: The Hive network is overloaded. This will directly affect the Empress race's state of mind and may cause a conduction collapse of the entire network!
LanguageData.ARA_NetworkOverloadCleared: Hive network overload has been resolved
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Research_DescriptionText: Insect swarm evolution points are a special resource that exists only in Arachne's spirit-sucking species. Spirit-sucking species acquire evolution points by absorbing incapacitated captives, and these can be used to strengthen individual abilities and research special insect swarm technologies.
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Load_Critical: Warning: Nerve bundle load approaching limit!
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Load_DescriptionText: Nerve bundle load is an index that evaluates the degree of load on the nerve bundle that occurs when an Arachne spirit sucker uses psychic techniques.As a mobile artillery, a spirit sucker can activate various psychic techniques almost infinitely, but at the cost of doing so, there is a risk of burning out its own brain.If the load becomes excessive, this must be discharged as mental entropy.
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Gizmo_Hint: Hover your mouse over the indicator to see detailed information
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_SystemNotAvailable: {0}'s insect swarm technique system cannot be used.
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Load_OverloadWarning: Warning: Nerve bundle load exceeds capacity!
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Gizmo_OverloadWarning: Warning: Unit is overloaded and cannot self-cool down!
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Cooldown_Behavior: After cooldown ends, load will be reduced by 1 every 2 seconds.
LanguageData.ARA_SwarmSpell_Load_Recovery: After the cooldown ends, the nerve bundle load will automatically decrease
